data.text:
Moovit is the world's #1 urban mobility app. All local mobility options in one app: buses, rail, the tube, bikes, Uber and more...

Moovit is one app for all your urban mobility and transport rides!

Dailymail - "This travel app is a godsend for anyone using public transport â with live updates to bus schedules, as well as a great route-planner for cities across the UK."

Transportation is an integral part of urban living. Whether you ride the train, subway/underground /tube, bus, light rail, ferry or metro, use bikes, ride-sharing like Uber, getting the best urban mobility information is critical. Moovit guides you from point A to B in the easiest and most efficient way. Get train and bus times, maps, and live arrival times with ease so you can plan your trip with confidence. Find critical alerts and service disruptions for your favorite lines. Get step-by-step directions of optimal route bus, train, metro, bike or a combination of them.

This is why Moovit has been named one of the best apps of the year 2017 by the App Store!

Moovit guides more than 865 million users in over 3200 cities throughout the world.

âº Journey Planner that combines you all transport options and gives you the best route with live arrivals.

âº Live Directions: Get step-by-step directions with live guidance as you travel: know exactly how long you need to walk to your station, how long youâre waiting, view the arrival time of your line and how many stops are left.

âº Real time arrivals. View real-time arrival updates, which are taken directly from GPS devices positioned on buses and trains.

âº Real time alerts. Know about issues ahead of time by receiving service alerts such as emergency or unexpected disruptions, delays, traffic jams, new construction and more...

âº Users reports. Moovitâs users report issues found with stations, line service, and timetables so that we can inform all nearby riders about whatâs going on in their area.

âº Favorite lines, stations, and places. Get easy access to lines, stations, and places you ride and visit all the time. Plus, get real-time updates if/when there are changes to your favorite lines in case your bus or train time is impacted!

âº Bike routes. Get bike routes in addition to the bus, subway, train, or metro trip plans. If you ride bikes (yours or shared) we can plan a route that includes the train or bus.

Bike docking stations are updated in real-time.

âº Maps view. View all stations, routes, and lines on the subway or bus map. Additionally, maps are available in PDF for when youâre offline, or underground on the subway.

Ride with Moovit in all major cities:

UK:

â¢ London

â¢ Manchester

â¢ Birmingham

â¢ Leeds

â¢ Edinburgh

â¢ Glasgow

â¢ Liverpool

â¢ Sheffield

Ireland:

â¢ Dublin and all of the Republic of Ireland.

Moovit supports all major transit:

UK:

â¢ TFL - Bus, Tube, DLR, Overground, Ferry (River Bus), Tfl Rail, Tram, Coach

â¢ National Express

â¢ National Rail

â¢ Arriva

â¢ First

â¢ Stagecoach and more...

Ireland:

â¢ Bus Eireann

â¢ Dublin Bus

â¢ Irish Rail

â¢ Luas

â¢ Kenneallyâs Bus Service and moreâ¦

Bike sharing provided by:

â¢ Santander Cycles in London

â¢ BelfastBikes in Belfast

â¢ Bike in Bath

â¢ Nextbike in Glasgow

India:

â¢Delhi: Delhi Metro (DMRC), Delhi Buses (DTC), Northern Railways (NR)

â¢Mumbai: Mumbai Metro (M.M.R.D.A), all buses: BEST, NMMT, KDMT, VVMT, MBMT, KMT, TMT, Ferries and more

â¢Bangalore: Namma Metro, B.M.T.C (buses and metro feeder routes), South Western Railways

â¢Chennai: Chennai Metro Rail, all buses - Metropolitan Transport Corporation (MTA)

â¢Ahmedabad: A.M.T.S, Bus Rapid Transport System (BRTS), V.T.C.O.S

â¢Pune: Indian Railways, Pune Local Central Railways, Pune Mahanagar Parivahan Mahaman.

Singapore:

â¢ MRT, LRT, bus, tram, cable car & shuttle buses. Service provided by:

â¢ SBS

â¢ SMRT

â¢ Tower Transit

â¢ Go-Ahead Singapore

You ride, we guide!
